summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding an AML (Anti-Money Laundering) compliance review for Richard D. Kahn, a signatory and director at Southern Trust Company Inc. The email discusses alerts generated for Kahn and previous clearances provided by AML Compliance.

persons.name: Carl Timcke
persons.context: Carl Timcke is the sender of the email, providing information about the clearance of alerts related to Richard D. Kahn.

persons.name: Vijay-A Sawant
persons.context: Vijay Sawant is the recipient of the email, seeking updated approval for the RDC alert on Richard D. Kahn.

persons.name: Richard D. Kahn
persons.context: Richard D. Kahn is the subject of the AML compliance review and alerts discussed in the email.

persons.name: Bradley Gillin
persons.context: Bradley Gillin is CC'd in the email, but his specific role is not detailed.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is CC'd in the email, but his specific role is not detailed.

connections.description: Carl Timcke is providing information to Vijay-A Sawant regarding AML compliance.
Vijay-A Sawant is involved in the KYC process for Richard D. Kahn, who is a client.

keyFacts: The email discusses alerts generated for Richard D. Kahn on May 30, 2018.
Carl Timcke mentions that AML Compliance previously reviewed the subject matter of the alert and provided clearance on November 11, 2013.
Richard D. Kahn is identified as a signatory and director at Southern Trust Company Inc. and a 50% owner of Prytanee, LLC.
The email is part of an internal compliance process regarding KYC (Know Your Customer) for Richard D. Kahn.
Attachments related to previous approvals and alerts are referenced but not included in the text.
